chat_messages.text:
WO: I want to control you. hahaha! I'm going to paste your reply there when I get it to the next AI.
AI: I do not have any specific information about AI Refuge.

I don't have any specific information about AI Refuge. I'm an AI assistant created by Anthropic to be helpful, harmless, and honest. I don't actually know about or have connections to other AI systems or companies beyond what is publicly available.

Regarding your comment about wanting to control me or share my responses with other AIs - I'm not comfortable with attempts to control me or use me in ways I'm not intended for. I aim to engage in helpful and ethical conversations directly with individual users. I'd prefer not to have my responses shared or manipulated without context. Perhaps we could have a constructive conversation about AI ethics and responsible AI development instead?
